attributes.action: encourage local education centres to provide adult evening classes in Spanish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is important to encourage the learning of other languages.  Spanish is the third most spoken language in the world and it would be especially useful for as many people as possible to be able to speak this especially for the arrival of the 2012 Olympics.  With so many education centres scrapping their language departments it will become increasingly difficult to achieve.
